Text.Page:
The swamp in the center of the vale is covered by a sort of bubble. It may be an argon forcefield of some kind. I suspect the bubble itself is generated by the {@Creature:45#7002#trolnik spires} within.

Bring me some parts of those controller spires I can analyze, will you? You might have to break them...
These will do nicely, <PCNAME>. Thank you.
Do you have those spire fragments for me?
